Rule.Filter: [tourism] = 'wilderness_hut' or [tourism] = 'basic_hut' or ([amenity] = 'shelter' and ([shelter_type] = '' or [shelter_type] = 'weather_shelter' or [shelter_type] = 'basic_hut' or [shelter_type] = 'lean_to'))

[tourism] = 'wilderness_hut' or [tourism] = 'basic_hut' or ([amenity] = 'shelter' and ([shelter_type] = '' or [shelter_type] = 'weather_shelter' or [shelter_type] = 'basic_hut' or [shelter_type] = 'lean_to'))
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road' ) and not ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] ='road') and ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] ='road') and not ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road' ) and ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway' ) and ([sac_scale]='demanding_mountain_hiking' or [sac_scale]='alpine_hiking') and (not [trail_visibility]='intermediate' and not [trail_visibility]='horrible' and not [trail_visibility]='bad' and not [trail_visibility]='no')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway') and ([sac_scale]='demanding_alpine_hiking' or [sac_scale]='difficult_alpine_hiking') and (not [trail_visibility]='intermediate' and not [trail_visibility]='horrible' and not [trail_visibility]='bad' and not [trail_visibility]='no')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway') and (not [sac_scale]='demanding_mountain_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='alpine_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='demanding_alpine_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='difficult_alpine_hiking')
and (not [trail_visibility]='intermediate' and not [trail_visibility]='horrible' and not [trail_visibility]='bad' and not [trail_visibility]='no')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway') and not ([tunnel] = 'yes') and ([sac_scale]='demanding_mountain_hiking' or [sac_scale]='alpine_hiking') and ([trail_visibility]='intermediate' or [trail_visibility]='bad' or [trail_visibility]='horrible' or [trail_visibility]='no')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway') and not ([tunnel] = 'yes') and ([sac_scale]='demanding_alpine_hiking' or [sac_scale]='difficult_alpine_hiking') and ([trail_visibility]='intermediate' or [trail_visibility]='bad' or [trail_visibility]='horrible' or [trail_visibility]='no')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway') and (not [sac_scale]='demanding_mountain_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='alpine_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='demanding_alpine_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='difficult_alpine_hiking')
and ([trail_visibility]='intermediate' or [trail_visibility]='horrible' or [trail_visibility]='bad' or [trail_visibility]='no')
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([bridge] = 'yes' or [bridge] = 'true' or [bridge] = '1')
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([bridge] = 'yes' or [bridge] = 'true' or [bridge] = '1')
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([bridge] = 'yes' or [bridge] = 'true' or [bridge] = '1')

Layer.name: srtm_10
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select way,height from courbesniveaux WHERE height::integer % 10 = 0 AND height::integer % 50 != 0 AND height::integer % 100 != 0) as "contours-10"

Layer.name: srtm_50
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select way,height from courbesniveaux WHERE height::integer % 50 = 0 AND height::integer % 100 != 0) as "contours-50"

Layer.name: srtm_100
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select way,height from courbesniveaux WHERE height::integer % 100 = 0) as "contours-100"

Layer.name: leisure
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select * from planet_osm_polygon order by z_order,way_area desc) as leisure

Layer.name: water_areas
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select * from planet_osm_polygon where waterway IS NOT NULL or landuse='reservoir' or landuse='water' or "natural"='lake' or "natural"='water' or "natural"='land' order by z_order) as water_areas

Layer.name: water_lines
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select * from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NOT NULL or "natural" is not null or man_made is not null order by z_order) as water_lines

Layer.name: tunnels
Layer.Datasource:
&postgis-settings;
(select * from planet_osm_line order by z_order) as roads

Layer.name: tracks-notunnel-nobridge
Layer.Datasource:
&postgis-settings;
(select way,smoothness from planet_osm_line where highway='track' and (bridge is null or bridge in ('no','false','0')) and (tunnel is null or tunnel in ('no','false','0'))) as tracks

Layer.name: minor-roads
Layer.Datasource:
&postgis-settings;
(select * from planet_osm_line order by z_order) as roads

Layer.name: roads
Layer.Datasource:
&postgis-settings;
(select * from planet_osm_roads order by z_order) as roads

Layer.name: waterway-bridges
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select * from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NOT NULL or landuse='reservoir' or landuse='water' or "natural"='lake' or "natural"='water' order by z_order) as water

Layer.name: bridges
Layer.Datasource:
&postgis-settings;
(select * from planet_osm_line order by z_order) as roads

Layer.name: trams
Layer.Datasource:
&postgis-settings;
(select * from planet_osm_line where "railway"='tram' order by z_order) as trams

Layer.name: amenity
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select * from planet_osm_point where amenity IS NOT NULL or tourism is NOT NULL or railway is NOT NULL or "natural" is NOT NULL or man_made is NOT NULL or highway is NOT NULL or aeroway is NOT NULL or power_source is NOT NULL) as amenity

Layer.name: power
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select way from planet_osm_line where "power"='line') as power

Layer.name: power_towers
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select way from planet_osm_point where power='tower') as power_towers

Layer.name: line features
Layer.Datasource:
&postgis-settings;
(select way,highway,landuse,"natural",man_made,waterway,name,ref,char_length(ref) as length from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NULL and leisure IS NULL and landuse IS NULL) as roads

Layer.name: planet roads text osm
Layer.Datasource:
&postgis-settings;
(select way,highway,landuse,"natural",man_made,waterway,tourism,amenity,place,name,ref,char_length(ref) as length from planet_osm_line where boundary is NULL and leisure is NULL and waterway IS NULL and landuse IS NULL) as roads

Layer.name: area-text
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select name,way_area,way,military,tourism,ele from planet_osm_polygon where name is not null and boundary is null order by z_order,way_area desc) as leisure

Layer.name: admin
Layer.Datasource:
&postgis-settings;
(select way,admin_level from planet_osm_roads where "boundary"='administrative' and admin_level in ('2','4') ) as admin

Layer.name: protected_area
text
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; planet_osm_point
